function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contradictory findings about the association between gardening and health outcomes","Impact":"Inaccurate health advice and recommendations based on conflicting research","Mitigation":"Conduct further research to clarify the relationship between gardening and health outcomes","Technologies":"Research methodologies and data analysis tools","People":"Older individuals, healthcare providers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for gardening frequency and duration in the study","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess the impact of gardening on health outcomes","Mitigation":"Include measures for gardening frequency and duration in future studies","Technologies":"Survey tools, data collection methods","People":"Researchers, survey designers","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Limited characterization of variance in gardening activities","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of the physical requirements and benefits of gardening for older individuals","Mitigation":"Develop comprehensive measures to capture variance in gardening activities, including physical capacity and gardening intensity","Technologies":"Observational tools, activity tracking devices","People":"Older individuals, healthcare providers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, technology developers"}]}
